Topic.Title: Announcing the "Conjuring and Prophecy Unit" Game

Posts.EditableText:
**Conjuring and Prophecy Unit**

Telin Castle, year 1337 - A simple, patient troubleshooter gets blamed unjustly when a magical device being used to infiltrate the castle goes wrong. The only way to escape the blame is to solve the problem in the device.  

This is a first-time text game release.   **Conjuring and Prophecy Unit** is a simple educational game with a fantasy theme. 

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/play/38tzl5akte2tyqg38bverg
